review: When it's working correctly, I love my FireStick...unfortunately, it has a major problem. The stick frequently loses Internet connection. I've read other reviews and troubleshooting tips which suggest unplugging the device from the power source for approximately 30 seconds. This works, but it's annoying to have to do this 3-4 times while watching a movie. I returned my first FireStick thinking it was a faulty device, but when the replacement did the same thing, I'm thinking it's a systemic error. Fix this design flaw (and give me an improved version) and I'll happily award five stars!
author: Alineal

review: I am so frustrated with this product.  I mainly watch Netflix using the Fire Stick and there is a 'glitch' that randomly prevents Netflix from loading.  You'll get different error messages but basically the app won't load or your show won't load.  Sometimes this happens when you are already in Netflix. A nice poster on an Amazon forum about this issue gave a workaround (clear the memory in Amazon video app & unplug), but it is a pain and Amazon should be fixing this problem via a software update.  The first star is for easy setup and the second star is because it was $20 when I bought it; so at least it was cheap!
